CIPHER.151.cipherString: Science fiction encourages us to explore... all the futures, good and bad, that the human mind can envision.
CIPHER.151.question: Solve this quote by Marion Zimmer Bradley.

CIPHER.165.cipherString: The definition of comfort zone: Good is the enemy of your best.
CIPHER.165.question: Decode this phrase by DeWayne Owens which was encoded with with the Vigènere cipher using the keyword HELIX.

CIPHER.157.cipherString: Sometimes in life, a sudden situation, a moment in time, alters your whole life, forever changes the road ahead.
CIPHER.157.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Ahmad Ardalan and has the word THE in it once.

CIPHER.159.cipherString: Waiting around two bee perfect never amounts two anything. Don't bee a wader oar Yule bee serving other people.
CIPHER.159.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Ian Desabrais and was misheard by Alexa and encoded with a K1 alphabet.

CIPHER.155.cipherString: An apple a day keeps the doctor away. But eating too many, is quite enough-plenty. And you'll have to go see the good doc anyway.
CIPHER.155.question: Decode this phrase by Solange nicole which has been encoded using a Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.164.cipherString: To truly laugh, you must be able to take your pain, and play with it.
CIPHER.164.question: Encode this phrase by Charlie Chaplin using the Vigenère cipher with a keyword of INERT.

CIPHER.161.cipherString: Mathematics is like checkers in being suitable for the young, not too difficult, amusing, and without peril to the state.
CIPHER.161.question: Solve this Patristocrat encoded quote by Plato with a K2 alphabet and ends with STATE.

CIPHER.154.cipherString: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.
CIPHER.154.question: Encode this phrase by Santosh Kalwar using a Caesar cipher with a shift of 7.  I.e. A is encoded as H.

CIPHER.158.cipherString: At its heart, engineering is about using science to find creative, practical solutions. It is a noble profession.
CIPHER.158.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Queen Elizabeth II.

CIPHER.162.cipherString: If our Founding Fathers wanted us to care about the rest of the world, they wouldn't have declared their independence from it.
CIPHER.162.question: Solve this K1 alphabet encoded Patristocrat which is a quote by Stephen Colbert.

CIPHER.169.question: Using a key of ROIL, compute the decryption matrix for a 2x2 Hill cipher using a 26 character alphabet.

CIPHER.167.cipherString: Go ahead and believe that no one shines brighter than you. Become amazing, and be happy.
CIPHER.167.question: Figure out what these strange headlines encoded using a Baconian alphabet mean.  It was said by Demi Lovato and starts out with GOAH. What does it say?

CIPHER.163.question: Encode this phrase from Garth Stein using the Affine cipher with a=7 and b=3.

CIPHER.153.cipherString: With time we learn that the things we're better off without have the ability to lead us somewhere better than we were before.
CIPHER.153.question: Decode this phrase by Andrew Kendall which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.160.cipherString: Never let hard lessons harden you're hart; teh hard lessons of lief are meant two make ewe bettor, knot bitter.
CIPHER.160.question: Solve this Aristocrat encoded quote by Roy T. Bennett which was misheard and then typed in with mistakes before being encoded with a K2 alphabet.

CIPHER.152.cipherString: Remember that life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away!
CIPHER.152.question: Encode this phrase by Vicki Corona using the Atbash Cipher

CIPHER.168.cipherString: Se ha convertido terriblemente obvio, que la tecnología ha sobrepasado nuestra humanidad.
CIPHER.168.translation: It has become terribly obvious, that technology has surpassed our humanity.
CIPHER.168.question: Solve this Xenocrypt in Spanish which is a quote by Anonymous that has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.

CIPHER.156.cipherString: When I hear music, I fear no danger. I am invulnerable. I see no foe. I am related to the earliest times, and to the latest.
CIPHER.156.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Henry David Thoreau which has the word SEE in it.

CIPHER.166.cipherString: What should scare you is not knowing what you don’t know. Always be eager to learn for knowledge is power.
CIPHER.166.question: Decode this quote by De philosopher DJ Kyoss which has been encoded using a Baconian cipher.
